about_the_game:
Enzo is a lonely boy drowned into deep frustration caused by unfortunate events. His mother was lynched by the people of the small town where they live and his dad listed him to a schizophrenia treatment with a drug called tetrika-zero.
But, on a special night, when his delusions attack his ego, he walks into an abandoned house and, at that same moment, he knew that it was the cause of every disgrace that collapsed his entire life.
Will Enzo find out the truth about his life? Will his compromised sanity, due to his treatment, make him believe in things that he’ll see?
The project is based on a small town, where Enzo struggle to discover the truth and the reason for his suffering.
Enzo is drowned into cruelty and omission. His life depends in how well he’ll manage his emotions to walk away from that house alive, without commiting suicide.

House of Hypocrisy is a survival/ psychological terror game where you experience the misery of Enzo, someone whose live went wrong in several ways. The game will be divided in chapters and it’s a critique of real life issues that had plagued the modern man.
detailed_description:
Enzo is a lonely boy drowned into deep frustration caused by unfortunate events. His mother was lynched by the people of the small town where they live and his dad listed him to a schizophrenia treatment with a drug called tetrika-zero.
But, on a special night, when his delusions attack his ego, he walks into an abandoned house and, at that same moment, he knew that it was the cause of every disgrace that collapsed his entire life.
Will Enzo find out the truth about his life? Will his compromised sanity, due to his treatment, make him believe in things that he’ll see?
The project is based on a small town, where Enzo struggle to discover the truth and the reason for his suffering.
Enzo is drowned into cruelty and omission. His life depends in how well he’ll manage his emotions to walk away from that house alive, without commiting suicide.

House of Hypocrisy is a survival/ psychological terror game where you experience the misery of Enzo, someone whose live went wrong in several ways. The game will be divided in chapters and it’s a critique of real life issues that had plagued the modern man.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 260 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.5 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: House of Hipocrisy a casa Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 260 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
